analysis.description:
EthGold.transferMoney (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a9a5083135d0c80cce8e0f424336567e616ef64.sol#170-178) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _address.transfer(contractBalance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a9a5083135d0c80cce8e0f424336567e616ef64.sol#177)
	- _address.transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a9a5083135d0c80cce8e0f424336567e616ef64.sol#177-178)
Address.toAddress (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a9a5083135d0c80cce8e0f424336567e616ef64.sol#68-76) is declared view but contains assembly code

Address.toAddress uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a9a5083135d0c80cce8e0f424336567e616ef64.sol#68-76)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x4a9a5083135d0c80cce8e0f424336567e616ef64.sol#72-76
